title: jQuery 与 Ajax 入门 - 0306 播放列表查看
slug: 2021-03-14-jQuery 与 Ajax 入门 - 0306 播放列表查看
path: api/articles/2021-03-14-jQuery 与 Ajax 入门 - 0306 播放列表查看.json
content:
题目

通过 Ajax 可以根据用户的点击，显示相关内容。

参考分析思路：页面接受 Servlet 返回给 Ajax 的内容，使用 JS 相关代码完成。

运行效果参见下图：

代码

// MusicListServlet.java
package pub.zxj.ajax.practice;

import com.alibaba.fastjson.JSON;

import javax.servlet.annotation.WebServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.ArrayList;

/**
 * @author Jaime
 */
@WebServlet(name = "MusicListServlet",value = "/music_list")
public class MusicListServlet extends HttpServlet {
    @Override
    protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws IOException {
        ArrayList<String> musicArrayList = new ArrayList<>();
        musicArrayList.add("稻香<br>晴天<br>告白气球");
        musicArrayList.add("千千阙歌<br>傻女<br>七友");
        musicArrayList.add("一块红布<br>假行僧<br>新长征路上的摇滚");
        resp.setContentType("text/html;charset=UTF-8");
        resp.getWriter().println(JSON.toJSONString(musicArrayList));
    }
}

<!-- musicArrayList.jsp -->
<html>

<head>
    <title>播放列表查看</title>
    <style type="text/css">

        * {

            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        #list {
            width: 522px;
            height: 30px;
            margin: 10px auto;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            line-height: 26px;
            vertical-align: middle;
        }

        #info-panel {
            width: 522px;
            height: 80px;
            margin: 10px auto;
            text-align: center;
        }

        input {
            width: 171px;
        }
    </style>
</head>

<body>
    <div id="list">
        <input name="btn" type="button" value="流行歌曲" />
        <input name="btn" type="button" value="经典歌曲" />
        <input name="btn" type="button" value="摇滚歌曲" />
    </div>
    <div id="info-panel"></div>

    <script type="text/javascript" src="https://s3.pstatp.com/cdn/expire-1-M/jquery/3.5.1/jquery.min.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        let btn = document.getElementsByName("btn");
        console.log(btn);
        for (let i = 0; i < btn.length; i++) {
            // console.log(btn[i]);
            btn[i].setAttribute("btnIndex", i.toString());
            btn[i].onclick = function() {
                $.ajax({
                    "url": "/ajax_war_exploded/music_list",
                    "type": "GET",
                    "dataType": "json",
                    "success": function(json) {
                        console.log(json[i]);
                        document.getElementById("info-panel").innerHTML = json[i];
                    }
                })
            }
        }
    </script>
</body>

</html>
